entry.title: CTV + CSFS: a letter
entry.summary: In a recent communication, the focus was placed on understanding the varying needs and drivers of businesses and individuals within a particular sector. The discussion highlighted a lack of consensus concerning future actions if there is no progress on covenants by 2026. It was explicitly mentioned that any perceived threats or implications of consequences were baseless, with no real substance or discussions backing them up. This clarification aimed to dispel any misunderstandings regarding the intentions or statements made by individuals involved in the discourse.
